foreignData.name: Landweihe
foreignData.text:
Landverzauberung
Das verzauberte Land ist unzerstörbar und kann nicht von anderen Auren verzaubert werden.

foreignData.name: Consagrar la tierra
foreignData.text:
Encantar tierra.
La tierra encantada es indestructible y no puede ser encantada por otras auras.

foreignData.name: Terrain consacré
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : terrain
Le terrain enchanté est indestructible et ne il ne peut pas être enchanté par d'autres auras.

foreignData.name: Terra Consacrata
foreignData.text:
Incanta terra
La terra incantata è indistruttibile e non può essere incantata da altre Aure.

foreignData.name: 土地の聖別
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントされている土地は破壊されず、他のオーラによってエンチャントされない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: Consagrar Terreno
foreignData.text:
Encantar terreno
O terreno encantado é indestrutível e não pode ser encantado por outras Auras.

foreignData.name: Освятить Землю
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать Землю
Зачарованная земля неразрушима и не может быть зачарована другими Аурами.

foreignData.name: 祝圣大地
foreignData.text:
地结界
受此结界的地不会毁坏，且不能被其它灵气结附。

name: Consecrate Land
originalText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

rulings.text: The land can be targeted by land-destroying spells and the spell will resolve, but the land will simply not be destroyed.
If Consecrate Land enters the battlefield attached to a land that’s enchanted by other Auras, those Auras are put into their owners’ graveyards.
A permanent with indestructible can’t be destroyed, but it can still be sacrificed, exiled, put into a graveyard, and so on.

text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.
